message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15000 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16500. It's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I am still only willing to pay up to $15000 for the product.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $16000? It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll find it's worth it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am still only willing to pay up to $15000 for the product.
